name: SubstanceSourceMaterial.organism.species
title: SubstanceSourceMaterial.organism.species
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The species of an organism shall be specified; refers to the Latin epithet of the species of the plant/animal; it is present in names for species and infraspecies
element.definition: The species of an organism shall be specified; refers to the Latin epithet of the species of the plant/animal; it is present in names for species and infraspecies.
